name: The Secret of the Past - Vampire Romance Story
name_original: The Secret of the Past - Vampire Romance Story
description:
How can a small town have such a big secret? Will the past repeat itself, or will things go on as if nothing happened? One of the best vampire romance story games is here! The children of the night never sleep. Take a deep breath and courageously dive into this breathtaking love game for girls. Start your teenage adventure and write your very own romantic story!

The best teenage love game will sweep you off your feet. Maybe some secrets should be left buried deep down and never be tackled. At times this otome game with choices can be dramatic, but never dull - this engaging virtual love romance story game will give you a unique opportunity to experience a teenage crush, through an exciting storyline and mesmerizing twists and turns.

Download on GooglePlay: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.secretofthepast.stories
